projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

A reference is given in the xml:id attributes consisting of

div.note:
1. Gilgit Manuscript
Majumder, Prabhas Chandra (1959), Ārya Maitreya-vyākaraṇam, Calcutta (also published in Nalinaksha Dutt, Gilgit Manuscripts, vol. IV, Calcutta 1959, pp. xxix ff. and 185 ff., under P.C. Mazumder).
The first folios of the Skt. text containing verses 1-30 are missing. All the sandhis are standardized.

lg.l: pade pade nidhanaṃ ca padmaṃ padmaṃ bhaviṣyati //
cintayiṣyati dharmātmā duḥkhitā khalv iyāṃ prajāḥ //
tasyām eva ca rātrau hi parāṃ bodhim avāpsyati //
taṃ cāpi dharmaṃ saṃśrutya pratipatsyanti śāsane //
pūrṇaṃ ca yojanaśataṃ parṣat tasya bhaviṣyati //
kṛtvā stūpeṣu satkāram āgatā hi mamāntikam //
dattvā śākyamuneḥ stūpeṣv āgatā hi mamāntikam //
kṛtvā ca kuśalaṃ karma macchāsanam upāgatāḥ //
śrutvā ca te tato dharmaṃ prāpsyanti padam uttamam //
sarve te asravās tatra kṣipayiṣyanti suratāḥ //
brahmā devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ pūjāṃ tasya kariṣyati //
aguruṃ candanaṃ cāpi divyaṃ mālyaṃ patiṣyati //
te pi taṃ pūjayiṣyanti praviśantaṃ purottamam //
vicitraṃ ca śubhaṃ mālyaṃ vikiriṣyanti te tadā //
śāstuḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti nāgāś cāpi maharddhikāḥ //
ko vidvān na prasīdeta api kṛṣṇāsu jātiṣu //

div.note:
2. Calcutta Manuscript (incomplete), ed. Lévi
Sylvain Lévi, "Maitreya le consolateur", Études d'orientalisme publiées par le Musée Guimet a la mémoire de Raymonde Linossier, Paris 1932, pp. 384-389
The first two folios of the Skt. text containing verses 1-25ab are missing. All the sandhis are standardized.

lg.l: kaiṭābhe sa nirghaṇṭe ca padavyākaraṇe tathā //
tasyāḥ kukṣau sa niyataṃ pratisandhiṃ grahīṣyati //
abhrakūṭād yathā sūryo nirgataś ca prabhāsate //
pade pade nidhanaṃ ca padmaṃ padmaṃ bhaviṣyati //
iyaṃ me paścimā jātir nāsti bhūyaḥ punarbhavaḥ //
śvetaṃ tasya surāś chattraṃ dhārayiṣyanti mūrdhani //
śriyā jvalantaṃ maitreyaṃ mātur haste pradāsyati //
sarvās tā janayiṣyanti putrān kṣemeṇa svastinā //
pratyavekṣya ca mantreṣu tataḥ prīto bhaviṣyati //
cintayiṣyati dharmātmā duḥkhitāh khalv imāḥ prajāḥ //
anuttarāṃ ca saṃbodhiṃ prāpsyati nātra saṃśayaḥ //
taṃ cāsya dharmaṃ saṃśrutya pratipadyanti śāsane //
pūrṇaṃ ca yojanaṃ śataṃ parṣat tasya bhaviṣyati //
kṛtvā śākyamuneḥ pūjāṃ hy āgatā mama śāsane //
dattvā śākyamuneḥ stūpe hy āgatā mama śāsane //
kṛtvā tu kuśalaṃ karma āgatā mama śāsane //
pratipālya yathābhūtaṃ hy āgatā mama śāsane //
vicitraṃ glānabhaiṣajyaṃ hy āgatā mama śāsane //
upavāsam upoṣitvā hy āgatā mama śāsane //
sarve te hy asravān dharmān kṣapayiṣyanti x x x //
aguruṃ candanaṃ caiva divyamālās tathaiva ca //
vicitraṃ ca śrutaṃ mālyaṃ vistariṣyanti te pathi //
sa caiva prāñjaliṃ kṛtvā stoṣyate lokanāyakam //
śāstuḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti nāgāś cāpi maharddhikāḥ //
vinayitvā ca saddharmaṃ tato nirvāṇam eṣyati //

div.trailer: Maitreyavyākaraṇaṃ samāptam // ye dharmā (etc.) // cīnadeśīvinirgataḥ bhikṣu puṇyakīrtir yad atra puṇyaṃ tad bhavatv ācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṅgamaṃ krtvā sakalasattvarāśer anuttarajñānaphalāptaya iti // śrīmad gopāladevarājyasaṃvat 57 phālguna dine 9 Ghosalīgrāme likhati / oṃ hārītī mahāyakṣiṇī hara hara mama sarvapāpāni svāhā //

div.p: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma / veṇuvane kalandakanivāse mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ //

lg.l: ṛddhiñ cāsyānubhāvañ ca tan me brūhi narottama //
vistaran tasya buddhasya maitreyasya śṛṇohi me //
śoṣam āyāsyate yasmāc cakravartī yathā hy asau //
tatra kāle bhaviṣyanti narās te śubhakarminaḥ //
bhaviṣyanti śubhā śabdā tūryās pañcāṅgikā iva //
bhaviṣyanti tadā tasya rājñaḥ śaṃkhasya bhūpateḥ //
kaiṭābhe ca sa nirghaṇṭe padavyākaraṇe tathā //
tasyāḥ kukṣau sa niyataṃ pratisandhiṃ grahiṣyati //
abhrakūṭād yathā sūryo nirgataś ca prabhāyate //
iyaṃ me paścimā jātir nāsti bhūyaḥ punarbhavaḥ //
śvetaṃ tasya surāś chattraṃ dhārayiṣyanti mūrdhani //
śriyā jvalantaṃ maitreyaṃ mātur haste pradāsyati //
sarvās tā janayiṣyanti putrān kṣemeṇa svastinā //
cintayiṣyati dharmātmā duḥkhitā khalv iyaṃ prajā //
anuttarāṃ ca saṃbodhiṃ prāpsyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
kṛtvā śākyamuneḥ pūjāṃ hy āgatā mama śāsane //
dattvā śākyamuneḥ stūpe hy āgatā mama śāsane //
kṛtvā tu kuśalaṃ karma hy āgatā mama śāsane //
pratipādya yathābhūtaṃ hy āgatā mama śāsane //
vicitraṃ glānabhaiṣajyaṃ hy āgatā mama śāsane //
upavāsam upoṣyeha hy āgatā mama śāsane //
sarve te sāsravān dharmān kṣayayiṣyanti suratāḥ //
devatāḥ prakramiṣyanti tasmin pure gate munau //
brahma devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ pūjāṃ tasya vidhāsyati //
aguruṃ candanaṃ caiva divyamālyaṃ tathaiva ca //
vicitraṃ ca tato mālyaṃ vikariṣyanti te pathi //

śāstuḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti nāgāś cāpi maharddhikāḥ //
vinayitvā ca saddharme tato nirvāṇam eṣyati //
ko vidvān na prasīdeta api kṛṣṇābhijātikaḥ //
